about_the_game:
A Lo-Fi Love Letter To Chill Adventures
The Harlow Original Soundtrack, much like the game itself, celebrates laid-back, relaxing, and playful adventure with each track. Inspired by Harlow creator Arman Nobari's journey through fighting cancer, a brain tumor, and grief, the songs find a resolute, tender, and enduring optimism from which uplifting journeys can grow. Studying, coding, writing, and adventures of your own will no doubt shine alongside these songs.

High-Quality Audio & Production
OBFUSC, who's features on the Monument Valley OST and who created the entire NeoCab OST, brings his ethereal, textured, out-of-this-dimension production to the Harlow Original Soundtrack. Arman Nobari, creator of Harlow, also co-produced the soundtrack. The soundtrack was mastered by Steven DePalo (Blacklist, Voxtrot).

1 Hour And 20 Minutes Of Vibes
Each of the 26 songs are carefully composed and full-length experiences. The album traverses themes of heartfelt optimism, bravery, and hopeful resolution.

name: Harlow Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 79 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1.3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Harlow Original Soundtrack Produced by Arman Nobari & OBFUSC

short_description: The Harlow Original Soundtrack, much like the game itself, celebrates laid-back, relaxing, and playful adventure with each track. Inspired by creator Arman Nobari's journey through fighting cancer & a brain tumor. Co-Produced by OBFUSC (Monument Valley, NeoCab).
